faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Learn more about Skinalyze AI and how to use the intelligent skin analysis system
faq.a1: Skinalyze uses advanced artificial intelligence technology to analyze skin images. The system is trained on millions of dermatological images and uses deep learning algorithms to identify abnormalities, providing assessments and reference recommendations.
faq.q2: What is the accuracy rate of Skinalyze AI?
faq.a2: Skinalyze AI achieves up to 94% accuracy in detecting common skin problems. However, results are for reference only and do not replace professional medical diagnosis.
faq.q3: Can I fully trust the AI results?
faq.a3: No. Results from Skinalyze AI are only a reference support tool. You should always consult with a dermatologist for accurate diagnosis and appropriate treatment methods.
faq.q4: What types of skin conditions can Skinalyze detect?
faq.a4: Skinalyze can identify and assess common skin issues such as: acne, dermatitis, melasma, freckles, cysts, abnormal moles, and many other skin conditions. The system is continuously updated to expand recognition capabilities.
faq.q5: How to take proper skin photos?
faq.a5: For best results: (1) Take photos in natural light or white LED light, (2) Keep camera about 15-20cm from the skin area, (3) Ensure images are clear and not blurry, (4) The skin area to be analyzed should occupy at least 50% of the frame.
faq.q6: Is my data and images secure?
faq.a6: Yes. Skinalyze is committed to absolute confidentiality of users' personal information and images. Data is encrypted and stored securely, not shared with third parties without your consent.
faq.a7: Skinalyze offers a free version with basic features. The Premium version with advanced features such as detailed analysis, history tracking, and expert consultation is paid.
faq.q8: Can I use Skinalyze on my phone?
faq.a8: Yes. Skinalyze has mobile applications for both iOS and Android. You can also use the web version on mobile browsers.
faq.a9: Skinalyze is designed for all ages, however for children under 13, parents need to supervise and consult with a pediatrician before using the analysis results.
faq.q10: If I'm not satisfied with the results, can I file a complaint?
faq.a10: If you have questions about the analysis results, please contact our support team via email support@Skinalyze.ai or live chat. We will review and assist you within 24 hours.

technology.description: Our core engine processes skin imagery with clinical precision. Combining pattern recognition with a vast database of dermatological case studies, Skinalyze offers hospital-grade screening at home.
technology.feature2Desc: Military-grade data security for patient privacy.

terms.title: Skinalyze Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to Skinalyze â€“ an AI system for scanning, analyzing and consulting on skin health. Please read the following terms carefully before using our service.
terms.section1Content: Skinalyze is an artificial intelligence (AI) platform in the medical field, helping users scan and analyze skin images and provide reference information about dermatological issues. This service does not replace professional medical diagnosis or treatment.
terms.section2Item1: Only use Skinalyze for personal or research purposes, not for commercial purposes without permission.
terms.section2Item2: Do not arbitrarily modify, copy, distribute or exploit the system's AI data.
terms.section2Item3: Be responsible for the accuracy of images and information provided to the system.
terms.section3Item1: Provide AI skin analysis services based on the most modern data and algorithms.
terms.section3Item2: Secure users' personal information and images in accordance with legal regulations.
terms.section3Item3: Not responsible for medical decisions based entirely on AI results without consultation from a specialist doctor.
terms.section4Content: Analysis results from Skinalyze are for reference only and do not replace professional medical advice. Users should consult professional medical advice before making treatment decisions.
terms.section5Content: Skinalyze is committed to securing users' personal information, images and medical data. Data is only used for AI analysis purposes and service quality improvement, not shared with third parties without consent.
terms.section6Content: Skinalyze reserves the right to change and update the terms of use at any time. Users should check regularly for the latest information.
terms.section7Content: If you have any questions about the terms of use, please contact us via email:
